items.details: Upcoming Tests Science - Topic 3 - Weather - November 26th Math - Topic 6 - Area - November 26th Reading The story Next week is Welcome Back Wolves. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5ZXpqMFQy0 The spelling test next Wednesday is accuse clever coast delicate explore imitate pierce rare symbol triumphExtra reading ( I have added some new stories) TO IMPROVE READING AND EMBED LEARNING, YOU SHOULD BE LOGGING INTO READWORKS Please go to ReadWorks and complete some of the stories assigned. They will assist you with your schoolwork and also enhance your overall reading skills. Go to www.readworks.org/student Enter our class code YU6GQ2 Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it. Math Complete Additional Practice 6-7 I have added New Khan Academy related to area. Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills. Spanish Write the Spanish words of the song Golden https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DMd18zBUbM0&list=RDDMd18zBUbM0&start_radio=1 Science Complete pages 120-123 in the science book to prepare for the test next week. Here is a blooket that will help with the science test next week. https://play.blooket.com/play?hwId=691d63229e44a5b1ad11c612 Language Arts Vocabulary Workshop - 72-73 Grammar Workshop - 74-77 1 more journal related to WORLD HERITAGE DAY.
